SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , T1.USR_ID AS USR_ID , T1.USR_NM AS USR_NM , T1.USR_EMAIL AS USR_EMAIL , T1.USR_IMG_ID AS USR_IMG_ID , T1.ARM_ID AS ARM_ID , T1.SEND_USR_ID AS SEND_USR_ID , T1.SEND_USR_NM AS SEND_USR_NM , T1.SEND_USR_EMAIL AS SEND_USR_EMAIL , T1.SEND_USR_IMG_ID AS SEND_USR_IMG_ID , T1.ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD AS ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD , T1.ARM_SEND_TYPE_NM AS ARM_SEND_TYPE_NM , T1.ARM_TITLE AS ARM_TITLE , T1.SEND_DTM AS SEND_DTM , T1.CHECK_CD AS CHECK_CD , T1.CHECK_NM AS CHECK_NM , T1.CHECK_DTM AS CHECK_DTM , T1.ATCH_FILE_ID AS ATCH_FILE_ID FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID AS LIC_GRP_ID , A.USR_ID AS USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, 1) AS USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, 2) AS USR_EMAIL , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, 6) AS USR_IMG_ID , A.ARM_ID AS ARM_ID , A.SEND_USR_ID AS SEND_USR_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.SEND_USR_ID, 1) AS SEND_USR_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.SEND_USR_ID, 2) AS SEND_USR_EMAIL , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.SEND_USR_ID, 6) AS SEND_USR_IMG_ID , A.ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD AS ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(A.LIC_GRP_ID, 'ARM100001', A.ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD, '1') AS ARM_SEND_TYPE_NM , A.ARM_TITLE AS ARM_TITLE , A.ARM_CONTENT AS ARM_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(A.SEND_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SEND_DTM , A.CHECK_CD AS CHECK_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(A.LIC_GRP_ID, 'COM00001', A.CHECK_CD, '1') AS CHECK_NM , TO_CHAR(A.CHECK_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CHECK_DTM , A.DEL_CHECK AS DEL_CHECK , A.SEND_DEL_CHECK AS SEND_DEL_CHECK , A.ATCH_FILE_ID AS ATCH_FILE_ID FROM ARM1000 A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.DEL_CHECK = '02' AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.SEND_USR_ID != #usrId#
AND A.SEND_DEL_CHECK = '02' AND A.USR_ID != #usrId# AND A.SEND_USR_ID = #usrId#
AND A.DEL_CHECK = '02' AND A.SEND_DEL_CHECK = '02' AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.SEND_USR_ID = #usrId#
AND A.DEL_CHECK = '02' AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.SEND_USR_ID != #usrId#
ORDER BY A.ARM_ID DESC ) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.USR_EMAIL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.SEND_USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.SEND_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.SEND_USR_EMAIL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.ARM_SEND_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.ARM_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.ARM_CONTENT, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(T1.SEND_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(T1.SEND_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND EXISTS( SELECT B.ATCH_FILE_ID FROM COMINFILEDETAIL B WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.ATCH_FILE_ID = T1.ATCH_FILE_ID AND B.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%' )
AND T1.CHECK_CD = '02'
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ASC
ORDER BY T1.ARM_ID DESC
